installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

GREEN="\033[0;32m"
CLEAR="\033[0m"

echo -e "${GREEN}downloading apt dependencies${CLEAR}"

apt update
apt install -y curl

if [ "${APT_PACKAGES}" != "" ]; then
	echo -e "${GREEN}Installing apt packages...${CLEAR}";
	apt install -y "${APT_PACKAGES}";
fi

mkdir -p /mnt/server
mkdir -p /mnt/server/deps
cd /mnt/server

# temp unset egg vars to solve conflicts (lit installation script uses the same vars)
_LIT_VERSION="$LIT_VERSION"
_LUVI_VERSION="$LUVI_VERSION"
export LIT_VERSION=
export LUVI_VERSION=

echo -e "${GREEN}downloading luvit${CLEAR}"
curl -L https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Be1zebub/lit/master/update-lit.sh | sh
# curl -L https://raw.githubusercontent.com/luvit/lit/master/get-lit.sh | env -i sh

export LIT_VERSION="$_LIT_VERSION"
export LUVI_VERSION="$_LUVI_VERSION"

echo 'print("Server startup complete") -- put this line in your app code so that the wings daemon can mark your server as running (or your app uptime will be in 'Starting' stage all time)

local http = require("http")
local env = require("env")

local port = tonumber(env.get("SERVER_PORT"))

http.createServer(function (req, res)
  local body = "Hello world\n"
  res:setHeader("Content-Type", "text/plain")
  res:setHeader("Content-Length", #body)
  res:finish(body)
end):listen(port, "127.0.0.1")

print("Server running at http://127.0.0.1:".. port .."/")' > start.lua

echo -e "${GREEN}installation done! put your app code in start.lua & start server.${CLEAR}"
